requirement_text: The plugin shall detect XML CoT messages starting with '<?xml' prefix
The plugin shall detect XML CoT messages starting with '<event' prefix
The plugin shall detect TAK Stream protocol (0xBF + varint length)
target_value: Magic byte 0xBF followed by length varint

requirement_text: The plugin shall detect TAK Mesh protocol (0xBF + version + 0xBF)
The plugin shall detect OMNI Protobuf by field tag patterns
target_value: First byte matches common field tags

requirement_text: The plugin shall parse event element attributes (type uid how version)
The plugin shall parse point element attributes (lat lon hae ce le)
The plugin shall parse contact element (callsign endpoint)
The plugin shall parse __group element (name role)
The plugin shall parse takv element (device platform os version)
The plugin shall parse track element (speed course)
The plugin shall parse status element (battery)
The plugin shall parse precisionlocation element (geopointsrc altsrc)
The plugin shall decode varint encoding natively
The plugin shall decode 64-bit fixed values (doubles)
The plugin shall decode length-delimited fields
The plugin shall decode field tags (number + wire type)
The plugin shall parse TakMessage with TakControl and CotEvent
The plugin shall parse TakControl (minProto maxProto contactUid)
The plugin shall parse CotEvent fields (type uid how times)
The plugin shall parse CotEvent point data as doubles
The plugin shall parse Detail submessage
The plugin shall parse Contact (endpoint callsign)
The plugin shall parse Group (name role)
The plugin shall parse Status (battery)
The plugin shall parse Takv (device platform os version)
The plugin shall parse Track (speed course) as doubles
The plugin shall parse PrecisionLocation (geopointsrc altsrc)
The plugin shall parse BaseEvent (entity_id sequence_number)
The plugin shall parse EventOrigin (source_uid source_net)
The plugin shall parse TimeOfValidity (updated timeout)
The plugin shall parse Alias repeated field
The plugin shall parse TrackEvent with position data
The plugin shall parse PlayerEvent (callsign)
The plugin shall parse ChatEvent (sender message)
The plugin shall identify OMNI event types by oneof field number
The plugin shall register on configurable TAK port (default 6969)
The plugin shall register on configurable OMNI port (default 8089)
The plugin shall display protocol hierarchy in packet details
The plugin shall support display filters on parsed fields
The plugin shall update info column with message summary
The plugin shall report malformed messages with expert info
The plugin shall report unsupported message types
